name: FaithEater
storyline: In a world where humans hunt the Gods for a chance at hope, you have betrayed the Faith Eaters. Given the highest punishment, you've been thrown into the Cathedral at the End of the World, where the God of Death Muerte has been imprisoned. You expect it to devour you without mercy. Instead, it offers you hope. The very same hope the Faith Eaters have taken away.
